title: Malicious portal edit
html:
戻る
神楽 - 2019-02-18 12:14:22+0000- 更新日時: 2019-02-18 12:14:22+0000
Appeal Category: Rejected Edit
Portal title: 末吉城址(東屋)
City, Region and Country: Japan, 石川県志賀町末吉地区
Lat/Long: 37.012300/136.785222
Intel: https://intel.ingress.com/intel?pll=37.012454%2C136.786632&ll=37.012454%2C136.786632&z=18

Reason/comments:

> From Niantic Support. Conversation ID: #905211

This current Intel location is obviously wrong. This location has been changed by malicious Portal Edit submission, I think.
An edit request has been rejected yesterday after several months.

The correct/previous location is almost below.

https://www.google.com/maps/?q=37.012300,136.785222

Please look at the Street View photo that I have posted. There are 2 arbors around the trail.

https://www.google.com/maps/@37.0123749,136.7852631,3a,73.7y,309.13h,77.93t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sAF1QipPNLVZ31eV0bxKjNgAwe3BD1rzBJm0k-_BUflBK!2e10!3e12!7i5376!8i2688

It seems the recent OPR Edit interface cannot detect duplicated existing Portal. That is problem.

Google Maps
